discovery_rule.name: Memory statistics
discovery_rule.description:
The rule will discover all memory matching the global regexp "Storage devices for SNMP discovery".
{$SNMP_COMMUNITY} is a global macro.

item_prototype.name: Available bytes on pool {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The number of available bytes (rounded to 1 MB blocks) on the volume.

item_prototype.name: Health of pool {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The current health of the containing pool, as reported by zpool status. online(1), degraded(2), faulted(3), unknown(4)

item_prototype.name: IO Read Ops on pool {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The number of read I/O operations sent to the pool or device.

item_prototype.name: IO Write Ops on pool {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The number of write I/O operations sent to the pool or device.

item_prototype.name: Name of pool #$1
item_prototype.description: The name of the filesystem type Volume

item_prototype.name: Read bandwidth on pool {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: the bandwidth of all read operations (including metadata), expressed as units per second

item_prototype.name: Size of pool {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The number of bytes (rounded to 1 MB blocks) part of the volume.

item_prototype.name: Usage of pool {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: Used percentage of the pools capacity

item_prototype.name: Used bytes on pool {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The number of bytes (rounded to 1 MB blocks) that are used.

item_prototype.name: Write bandwidth on pool {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: the bandwidth of all write operations expressed as units per second

trigger_prototype.name: Pool {#SNMPVALUE} is DEGRADED!
trigger_prototype.description: Your pool {#SNMPVALUE} is in degraded state. online(1), degraded(2), faulted(3), unknown(4)

trigger_prototype.name: Pool {#SNMPVALUE} is FAULTED!
trigger_prototype.description: Your pool {#SNMPVALUE} is in faulted state. You are in trouble

trigger_prototype.name: Pool {#SNMPVALUE} is in UNKNOWN state
trigger_prototype.description: Your pool {#SNMPVALUE} is in unknown state. You are in trouble, I really hope you have a backup

trigger_prototype.name: Pool {#SNMPVALUE} usage is over 80%
trigger_prototype.description: Your pool {#SNMPVALUE} is more than 80% full! It is a known fact that performance will degrade significantly. Please free up some space.
